thread.title_full: SNACK, SIP, AND POUR CANDLE EXPERIENCE! Tickets, K.LiddelCandleline, Los Angeles, 29 December to 28 June

author: K.LIDDELCANDLELINE
title: SNACK, SIP, AND POUR CANDLE EXPERIENCE! Tickets, K.LiddelCandleline, Los Angeles, 29 December to 28 June
text:
Join us for Snack Sip and Pour Candle Experience where you experience wine and candles!
About this Event
Join us for an evening of relaxation and creativity as we explore the art of candle making with a twist. In this workshop we'll be using fragrance oils and paraffin wax to create our very own signature scent candles. But that's not all! We'll also be enjoying some delicious wine and snacks to enhance the overall experience.
First we'll start by selecting our preferred fragrance oils from a wide range of options. Our expert candle maker will guide us through the process of measuring and mixing the ingredients allowing us to create a unique scent that perfectly suits our taste and mood.
As we wait for our candles to cure and set we'll take a break to enjoy some cheese crackers and other delectable snacks all perfectly paired with a selection of wines that complement the fragrances we've chosen.
Once our candles are ready we'll adorn them with decorative labels and packaging making them the perfect gift for friends and family or a lovely addition to our own homes.
No experience is necessary for this workshop so come as you are and let your creativity flow. This event is perfect for a girls' night out a date night or a fun activity to do with friends. So bring your sense of adventure and join us for an unforgettable evening of candle making wine and snacks!
P﻿arking: If you park in the buildings parking garage WE DO NOT VALIDATE AND ITS EXPENSIVE! On 7th Street and up there is parking garages lots and meter parking. The parking garages and lots are $13-$18 for the whole day.
I﻿f you have any other questions or concerns please give us a call at (323)241-8155.
Hope to see you there!
Event Venue K.LiddelCandleline, 515 South Flower Street Los Angeles, CA 90071, Los Angeles, United States
Tickets USD 45.00 to USD 65.00
